Services\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Following is the information about communication services you can address to get or deliver important information or if you need advice.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3702,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0b72b77a-f303-4b06-83ea-6e702340097f/21.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0b72b77a-f303-4b06-83ea-6e702340097f/21.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"21.PNG\",\"name\":\"21.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0b72b77a-f303-4b06-83ea-6e702340097f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":761,\"height\":48},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ORG Internal Communications Board\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" serves the company with the aim to establish communication services and processes in a modern and efficient way. Their goal is to create clear and comprehensive direct communications that help the company, its departments and employees of different levels get, discuss, and share the right information about the context in which they all work.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Internal Communications function is part of the Global Operations Organization, but it serves the needs of almost all the organization’s departments, managers, and employees, in their desire to share and receive information in a proper way.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The board is responsible for communications policies and frameworks within the organization and can advise on the process improvements if you need such an advice.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":3845,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6f95a82a-994e-4f2c-89e9-3a32a3a0c165/22.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6f95a82a-994e-4f2c-89e9-3a32a3a0c165/22.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"22.PNG\",\"name\":\"22.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6f95a82a-994e-4f2c-89e9-3a32a3a0c165\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":761,\"height\":48},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The only way to directly connect all EPAMers and create an organization where information flows freely, boosting everyone’s productivity, is through the global EPAM online community. This board consists of experts in building online communities and engaging people in meaningful communication. The primary communications platform is \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.yammer.com/epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Yammer\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is highly recommended to subscribe to corporate groups (like \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.yammer.com/epam.com/#/threads/inGroup?type=in_group&feedId=4785346&trk_event=search_ac&trk_model=group&trk_len=8&trk_pos=0\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"elements.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") on Yammer and to be actively involved in discussions to contribute your expertise and provide meaningful feedback to influence the company worldwide culture.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":4910,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/81934a69-2f99-49e4-a85f-e0e0c7f7a066/23.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/81934a69-2f99-49e4-a85f-e0e0c7f7a066/23.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"23.PNG\",\"name\":\"23.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"81934a69-2f99-49e4-a85f-e0e0c7f7a066\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":759,\"height\":49},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ORG External Communications / TA Marketing \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"provides and supports corporate services to improve the People Management brand externally. They navigate RMs activity to attract potential team assets in hiring campaigns. The department’s primary goal is to support external hiring activities, from media support to vacancy publishing and promotion.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Contact the team if you have vacancy-related questions or need improved promotion of your Unit’s vacancies or job opportunities on the market.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":2924,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c62d9a82-e859-44c9-a75c-49991c9da3d8/24.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c62d9a82-e859-44c9-a75c-49991c9da3d8/24.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"24.PNG\",\"name\":\"24.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c62d9a82-e859-44c9-a75c-49991c9da3d8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":759,\"height\":51},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Global marketing team\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is responsible for promoting the EPAM brand and values consistent with proper targets on the market globally. Besides, they manage and maintain brand assets internally to make sure that all EPAM communications follow our brand identity.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are supposed to champion the thread using the new branded materials, share the updates with your team / unit (e.g., presentation templates for external usage as an important representation of EPAM brand). Additionally, you can initiate the sharing of interesting case studies externally by contacting Global Marketing.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":2331,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4fbb5e80-5b7c-493f-b212-16e104e0a452/25.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4fbb5e80-5b7c-493f-b212-16e104e0a452/25.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"25.PNG\",\"name\":\"25.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4fbb5e80-5b7c-493f-b212-16e104e0a452\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":763,\"height\":48},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Social media (SM)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an essential part of communications around the world. While you and your team members are free to share every single thought they would like to share about their daily life, corporate discussions in SM are subject to corporate policies and guidance.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As People Management team-member, you need to make employees aware of those policies and guide them on how to use SM properly when discussions cover corporate topics.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"First, employees should not forget about NDAs and corporate secrets, EPAM values, and the Code of Conduct when communicating in SM as EPAM employees. EPAM marketing team has prepared a special guide you can share with your team to make communication consistent when discussing corporate issues: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://elements.epam.com/marketing-and-sales/brand-guides\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Social Media Policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
